properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , CREATE_DATE , NOTICE_COUNT FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_COUNT = NOTICE_COUNT +1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , CREATE_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO= ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO= ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FAQ_NO , USER_NO , FAQ_CATEGORY , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT FROM TB_FAQ WHERE FAQ_CATEGORY = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
